name: docs-generator
description: Professional document generation plugin with One Thousand branding. Generates scope documents, hackathon presentations, sprint design plans (Confluence), proposals, and client-facing deliverables from hackathon summaries and project briefs. Includes PPTX presentation generation with branded OT slide layouts, Confluence design plan generation, architecture diagram generation (Graphviz), confidence-scored content, iterative quality review, and anti-hallucination verification. Supports English and German.
